Job Title: Relationship Banker

Location: Seattle, WA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
Introduction 

Since 1973, East West Bank has served as a pathway to success. With over 120 locations across the U.S. and Asia, we are the premier financial bridge between the East and West. Our teams of experienced, multi-cultural professionals help guide businesses and community members on both sides of the Pacific looking to explore new markets and create new opportunities, and our sustained growth and expertise in industries like real estate, entertainment and media, private equity and venture capital, and high-tech help build sustainable businesses and expand our associates’ potential for career advancement.

Headquartered in California, East West Bank (Nasdaq: EWBC) is a top performing commercial bank with an exclusive focus on the U.S. and Greater China markets. With a strong foundation, and enterprising spirit and a commitment to absolute integrity, East West Bank gives people the confidence to reach further.

Overview

Being the next generation Relationship Banker at East West Bank means you are part of a world-class team that focuses on delivering a high quality, high-touch, and high-tech relationship banking experience across all customer touchpoints.

As a Relationship Banker, you will play a key role in

 managing, retaining, and acquiring long-lasting win-win relationships with our customers  identifying and understanding customers’ long-term financial needs and offering tailored product and services solutions  leveraging the bank’s latest technology products to meet our customers’ expanding needs 

We will help you grow your career at East West Bank by providing you with ongoing training to expand your business knowledge, grow your digital acumen, and build long-lasting relationships with our customers.

Responsibilities

 Achieve quarterly and annual team/branch sales goals: C&I, CRE, SBA, mortgage, treasury management, deposits, wealth management investment products, international deposits/wires, and other commercial and consumer products  Source and develop loans including but not limited to HELOC, Residential Loan and Commercial Loan  MLO position only: Comply with annual renewals and all regulations for MLO; understand the interest rates, financing, and calculations to better service potential mortgage customers  Maintain a thorough knowledge of the bank’s deposit, loan and ancillary products and an understanding of the qualifications required  Assist customers with financial needs such as cash withdrawals, deposits, transfers, loan/credit card payments, wire transfers and foreign currency exchange.  Highly motivated self-starter with a strong work ethic and focus on results with clients’ best interest in mind  Applies strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills to meet clients’ needs  Engage and partner with team members and other lines of business to offer most appropriate products to customers based on customers’ need  Communicates effectively and confidently while engaging with clients  Able to learn products, services, and technologies quickly and educate customers on conducting banking transactions online, via mobile app and self-service portals  Expert in using digital resources and technologies to optimize clients’ digital banking experience  Strong desire and ability to influence, educate, and connect customers to technology  Perform other duties as assigned 

Qualifications

 High school diploma or general education degree (GED) required; Bachelor’s degree preferred  2+ years of customer service, teller, sales experience, and MLO experience within the banking and/or financial service industry highly preferred  Strong working knowledge of branch operations  Consultative relationship sales role in a related industry, with proven success in establishing new clients, deepening customer relationships, and delivering results  Professional and thorough, with strong follow-up skills  Able to adapt to new process and technologies quickly  Strong familiarity and fluency with branch technology, mobile and online banking platforms  Strong problem-solving, decision-making, and customer-service skills 

Compensation

The base pay range for this position is USD $22.00/Hr. - USD $23.50/Hr. Exact offers will be determined based on job-related knowledge, skills, experience, and location.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
